director.name: 弗雷德里克·怀斯曼 Frederick Wiseman

introduction: This film shows the day to day activities of multi-handicapped and sensory impaired students and theirteachers, dormitory parents, and counselors at the Helen Keller School. The primary mission of the school isto meet the total and living needs of deaf and/or blind children, some of whom also have other disabilities.The film presents situations involving personal hygiene, mobility training, concepts of time and money, selfhelp and independent living, dormitory life, recreation, sports, vocational training, and psychologicalcounseling.
